website_summaries.verdict: A gentle, coffee-based exfoliant that's mild enough even for sensitive skin.
pros: Works even with sensitive skin or those who suffer from eczema
Helps skin that's dry or damaged by acne

customer_reviews.title: I love you, but don’t get attached
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product, but it’s discontinued and it’s infuriating. The product itself is messy and leaves your shower looking like you just dug your way out of being buried alive, but it leaves your body feeling and looking like a GODDESS. I can’t believe they don’t make this anymore, I honestly feel like I’ve been betrayed in a manner similarly to that of a relationship gone poorly. I’ll always look for this exact thing, but I might have to settle with a lesser version. It’s 2020- what else would I expect??
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Very messy. Strong but good scent.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and priced well for what you get, but you could very easily make this at home. It’s essentially moisturizing coffee scrub with a scent. The scent smells good but is a little strong for me personally. It leaves you with a nice oil/moisturized feel. Very messy in the shower but to be expected with a coffee scrub. Not sure I’ll be buying it again, but it really does make your skin feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description. Literally just ground coffee beans, not a scrub.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy Shea moisture products but felt the description was a bit misleading. It seemed it would be more like a scrub that was mixed with coconut oil and Shea butter. Instead, it is literally just coffee beans in a jar. It makes a mess and doesn’t blend well on the skin. It also clogs the drain so it is impractical. I wish it was more like a spread rather than just coffee beans by itself. I feel disappointed. I will try and find ways to repurpose this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Such a great scrub and smells devine
customer_reviews.text: I love this body scrub! I use it once a week in the shower. It is a little messy, so it requires some rinsing after use since the coffee granules don't dissolve. I'm moderately concerned that I'm going to have drain problems at some point, but let's hope not! I love the smell and how soft it makes my skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bartmann

customer_reviews.title: SCAM! Just coffee grinds
customer_reviews.text: Literally a jar of coffee grinds. They dumped old Folgers coffee grinds into this Shea Moisture container and I bought it for $15. It should not be dry coffee - I've purchased this product and similar coffee/coconut oil scrubs before. A scam that caused an explosive mess in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: cellulite fighter
customer_reviews.text: I use this scrub in shower before applying my self tan. I did not notice any huge improvement but i keep using it as i like the coffee smell and it is organic
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This makes my body feels so good. If you don’t like the smell of coffee you may not like it.
customer_reviews.author: tete

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It smells great, but it’s just a bin of loose coffee grinds. Wasn’t expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but really messy
customer_reviews.text: I love teh smell and it scrubs really good but its very loose and i have to scrub my tub whenever i use
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Clayton

customer_reviews.title: dry coffee sand
customer_reviews.text: I have had other coffee exfoliating scrubs and they've all had moisture to them... this is just dry grinds. I would like amazon to provide a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells and works AMAZING.
customer_reviews.text: This wakes me up every morning and is great at exfoliating.
customer_reviews.author: Zoë

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: i’m in love with this product. I highly recommend it.❤️
customer_reviews.author: merav kulovany

customer_reviews.title: BEST DANG PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product for my body care routine. I was using Mr Bean but I decided to try something new and I’m never going back! The pros include: <3 INCREDIBLE SMELL <3 INSTANT RESULTS IN SMOOTHNESS OF MY SKIN. MIND YOU I GET INGROWN HAIRS AND I LIKE MY LEGS TO BE SMOO5 AND THIS HELPS SO MUCH <3 JAR INSTEAD OF BAG - which helps keep it dry because I keep mine in shower area I’m so thrilled I took the chance on this product. Only a small amount is needed and washes away easily in tub
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best Product
customer_reviews.text: If you see any customers complain about this product. Please DISREGARD IT! It is amazing! This product is a mix of Shea Butter , Virgin Olive Oil and Coffee Grinds please understand that. Its Coffee , take a spoon place some in your palm after washing your face and rub it in! IT exfoliates and Hydrates your skin. It will not leave it dry ! Your going to love it. I have rough skin so I use more. If you have gentle sensitive skin use less. Mentality prepare yourself becuz it is coffee And It does smell like coffee I love it! IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Deontra Bethea

customer_reviews.title: Delightful!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this product. It feels so good and smells even better! Exfoliation just right, not to rough, and it leaves my skin soft and nourished.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hulse

customer_reviews.title: Something is missing
customer_reviews.text: It’s really just a jar of coffee grounds. Smells great but very dry. I can’t find the oil. There’s not much of anything to clump the grounds together so it’s messier and more easily wasted. I think I’ll return this and make my own.
customer_reviews.author: Teatiiime

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of oil.
customer_reviews.text: It has the perfect amount of coconut oil. It leaves your skin soft and stays moisturized throughout the day. The scrub can be a little messy but its has just enough oil that it doesn't congeal on the floor of the tub. The coffee grounds are quite course and are an amazing exfoliator.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using this product. When I was in the shower and opened the container, coffee grounds went everywhere!!! I had to use coconut oil to get the grounds from going everywhere. I would pass on purchasing this
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza

customer_reviews.title: Might as well use the coffee out of your drip coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I'm always looking for a good overall body scrub. Upon opening and using the first time, I thought maybe I did something wrong - it was just like taking the coffee grounds out of my Mr. Coffee and rubbing them on my body. So I tried again mixing it as much s I possibly could as the directions suggested. There was absolutely no difference. I threw it away after only two uses. What a waste of my money. Oh, and cleaning up my shower after using this stuff is ridiculous - looks like a coffee bomb went off in there!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Rockett

customer_reviews.title: Way too messy
customer_reviews.text: I actually dumped all the contents into a bowl hoping to stir in the oil which had settled to the bottom, but there was no oil there. There is some oil in the scrub. I can feel it nicely on my skin. The grounds do smell wonderful, especially first thing in the morning. But what-a-mess! Any more oil probably would leave my shower a slippery, gritty mess. Unless I build myself an outdoor shower, I can't imagine using this again.
customer_reviews.author: mehart01

customer_reviews.title: Skin so soft, tub so dirty...
customer_reviews.text: This scrub does leave the skin soft and supple but does a number on your pretty white tub. Imagine flinging wet, coarsely ground coffee beans all over your bath tub and shower walls... because that’s literally what you’ll be doing. It might not be such a pain to clean if you have a detachable showerhead. If you don’t, I’d recommend sticking to the sugar or sea salt scrubs, they’re clear and dissolve much better. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Body Oil for Unisex, Coffee Scrub, 12 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Coffee Scrub| Size:12 Ounce (Pack of 1)This coconut oil ground coffee scrub gently exfoliates dry, dull skin to smooth and soften even the roughest patches. This scrub exfoliates and restores to reveal moisturized, supple skin. Ground Coffee helps energize and nourish skin.
feature_bullets: This coconut oil ground coffee scrub gently exfoliates dry, dull skin to smooth and soften even the roughest patches
This scrub exfoliates and restores to reveal moisturized, supple skin
Ground coffee helps energize and nourish skin
